channel.title: Music – 허윤진(LE SSERAFIM)
channel.description: Recent content in 허윤진(LE SSERAFIM) on Music

item.title: 허윤진(LE SSERAFIM) - 피어나도록 (love you twice)
item.description:
A spotless bedroom
spends quiet nights
Pilates mornings and
she’s good with wine
She wakes
at the right time
Sets
the right vibes
She’s funny
but never too much
Mysterious
but always in touch
I wonder
what you see
When you see
someone like me
Do you see her?
won’t you rather
Touch marble
instead of limestone
All I wish to be is
someone deserving
Of the comfort
that you bring
‘Cause deep inside
I wanna be her
She takes
the hit
But never shows you
where it hurts
Bathes you
in spring sunshine
Wipes tears
dry
And says
I love you twice
Seasons
change
Say you’ll stay
the same
봄 가을
겨울도
Look my way
look your way
Say okay
I’m okay
눈꽃이 녹아도
넌 피어나도록
In seven years
time
Will I look back
and wonder
Why was I such a mess
unable to relax
날마다 불안 불안해
내 마음이
무대 위에선 chill
내려와선 녹지
남몰래 애써 장착해
내 red carpet의 착장
장난 같지만
나름 진지해진 대화
거울 속의 넌
명작의 초상화
매번 말해서
진부해지겠지만
널 잃을까 봐 두려운 건
똑같애
No matter
what you see
Can your eyes
please stay on me?
빛바래도
제일 빛난다고 해 줘
‘Cause deep inside
I wanna be her
She takes
the hit
But swings back
stronger than before
Bathes you
in spring sunshine
Wipes tears
dry
And says
I love you twice
Seasons
change
Say you’ll stay
the same
‘Cause
I love you
Look my way
look your way
Say okay I’m okay
피어나도록
I’ll say
I love you twice
